meanings.definition: Capable of being issued or put forth for consideration.
meanings.sent1: The proposal was issuably presented to the committee for review.
meanings.sent2: The new policy was issuably discussed during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The issuably idea of having a pizza party every day was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent4: Her issuably creative solutions always brought fresh perspectives to the team.
meanings.sent5: The issuably decision to move the project deadline surprised everyone.

meanings.definition: In a manner that allows for debate or discussion.
meanings.sent1: They issuably debated the best approach to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: The topic was issuably discussed among the group of friends.
meanings.sent3: He spoke issuably fast during the argument, trying to make his point.
meanings.sent4: The issue was resolved issuably, with everyone sharing their opinions.
meanings.sent5: She presented her argument issuably, inviting others to join the conversation.
